title: Effortless Attendance Tracking
text: MarkMePresent simplifies attendance tracking by allowing users to scan a QR code and verifying their location is close to the event, ensuring accurate and secure attendance records.

section.title: Why QR Codes?
section.content: QR codes provide a quick and seamless way for users to check in, reducing manual effort and errors.

section.title: Why Location Verification?
section.content: Location verification ensures that attendees are physically present at the event, enhancing the reliability of attendance data.
